channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Take 20 Percent Off Ooni’s Largest Pizza Oven for Labor Day
item.description: The Ooni Koda 2 Max is the best large pizza oven we have tested, and it’s now just over $1,000.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: The US Chip Manufacturers’ Bonanza
item.description: On this episode of “Uncanny Valley,” our senior business editor joins us to talk about the Trump administration’s deals with chipmakers, OpenAI’s pote...

item.title: The 38 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Labor Day Sale
item.description: Shop the best deals on WIRED-tested outdoor gear from REI, Nemo, MSR, Coleman, Fjällräven, and more during REI’s Labor Day sale.

item.title: Bounce launches a service for moving accounts between Bluesky and Mastodon
item.description: Bounce publicly debuts a tool that will let you move your account between open social networks like Bluesky and Mastodon.

item.title: NotebookLM’s Video Overviews feature now supports 80 languages
item.description: NotebookLM’s Video Overviews now supports 80 languages, including French and Spanish.

item.title: A new security flaw in TheTruthSpy phone spyware is putting victims at risk
item.description: Exclusive: Hackers can take over the accounts of TheTruthSpy spyware customers, putting their victims' private phone data at risk thanks to a new secu...

item.title: Best Early Labor Day Mattress Sales (2025)
item.description: It's one of the best times of the year to score a new mattress. Here are all the best deals (plus some exclusive sale codes) to snag ahead of the long...

item.title: Google will require developer verification for Android apps outside the Play Store
item.description: Google will ask all Android developers to verify their identity starting next year.

item.title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI, alleging anticompetitive collusion
item.description: According to Musk, Apple and OpenAI are colluding to stifle competition from other AI companies.

item.title: Best Discounts for Teachers (2025): Deals on School Supplies, Tech, and More
item.description: Ace the school year with special perks—like cheap software, phone plans, and classroom supplies.
